name: American Muscle Car Simulator - Turbo City Drag Racing Rivals Game FREE
name_original: American Muscle Car Simulator - Turbo City Drag Racing Rivals Game FREE
description:
** SUPER HD 3D GRAPHICS! **
** AWESOME MUSCLE CAR GAME! **

Get ready for an intense racing game where you get to get behind the wheel of a muscle car!! Featuring realistic graphics, and an adrenaline pumping game play, it's just you against everyone else.. who will come out on top?!

FEATURES

- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Multiple camera views.
- Ton of cars to unlock.
